Player History
Had first career hit on 4/4/1985, off Storm Davis (PHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/6/1985, off Gene Garber (ATL)...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/16/1985 with a Tender Shoulder, out for one week...
2/2/1986: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,421,429 through salary arbitration...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/27/1986 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won World Series with New York (M) in 1986...
2/2/1987: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,421,429 through salary arbitration...
9/16/1987: Signed a contract extension with New York (M), $4,800,000 per year, for 4 years.
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Injured on 6/17/1989 with a Strained Medial Collateral Ligament, out for 3-4 weeks...
Won World Series with New York (M) in 1989...
Injured on 4/16/1990 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
8/8/1991: Signed a contract extension with New York (M), $6,420,000 per year, for 3 years.
